snippet: There had been minor doubts about Mariano Rivera’s return to the Yankees, but on Friday the pitcher informed General Manager Brian Cashman that he would indeed return.
abstract: New York Yankees closer Mariano Rivera reaffirms his promise to return in 2013, at age 43, despite his season-ending knee injury in May.
lead_paragraph: There had been minor doubts about Mariano Rivera’s return to the Yankees, but on Friday the pitcher informed General Manager Brian Cashman that he would indeed return.

headline.seo: Yankees and Rivera Working Toward Deal
headline.main: No Doubts for Rivera and Yankees
headline.print_headline: No Doubts For Rivera And Yankees
